mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PJ_LOGHST_CHG( USERID, CREDENTIAL_ID, CREDT_DATE, URI, CHANGE_VALUE, ERROR_CD ) VALUES( NVL2(#{userid},"",#{userid}), NVL2(#{credential_id},"",#{credential_id}), sysdate, NVL2(#{uri},"",#{uri}), NVL2(#{change_value}, "", #{change_value}), NVL2(#{ERROR_CD},"",#{ERROR_CD}) )
